mapper.select:
select iiii.image_name, iiii.image_path as source_path, iiii2.image_path as thumbnail_path, iiii.image_md5 from im_i_image_info iiii join im_i_origin_small_relation iiosr on iiii.id = iiosr.origin_img_id join im_i_image_info iiii2 on iiosr.small_img_id = iiii2.id
, im_i_user_image_info iiuii where iiuii.user_id= #{userId} and iiosr.origin_img_id = iiuii.image_info_id
where iiosr.is_public=1
limit ${pageSize*(currentPage-1)},#{pageSize};

select
from im_i_image_info, im_i_user_image_info where im_i_user_image_info.user_id = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and im_i_user_image_info.image_info_id = im_i_image_info.id

select count(*) from im_i_image_info
, im_i_user_image_info where im_i_user_image_info.user_id = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and im_i_user_image_info.image_info_id = im_i_image_info.id
